column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The sides need a paragraph of their own!! The sides come in a large portion
column2: but everyone was delicious! The brussel sprouts should not be missed!! They are charred and have parmesan on them
column3: best i've ever had! The truffle mac and cheese was also unbelievable with a moderate taste of truffle. So cheesy and delicious. We also ordered the roasted garlic mashed potatoes
column6: we had the pommes frites which were crispy and served with a garlic aioli.
